resources.string: Are you sure you want to exit this quiz?
Are you sure you want to log out? You need to be logged in to play or search for playlists.
Are you sure you want to delete %1$s? This will not affect any Spotify playlists, and you can add it again later.
Are you sure you want to delete %1$s? This will only affect your favourites, and you can add it again later.
Are you sure you want to clear image cache? This will reduce memory usage, but may increase network traffic.
Are you sure you want to delete all of your playlists? This will not affect playlists on Spotify, and you can add them again later.
Are you sure you want to delete all of your favourites? This will not affect tracks on Spotify, and you can add them to your favourites again.
Are you sure you want to delete your local playlists and restore the defaults? This will not affect anything on Spotify.
Type the name or the Spotify Id of the playlist.
Are you sure you want to exit?
